translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なッ……ちょっと待ってよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Wait a minute!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知識も技術も、残していかないといけないの！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We have to preserve both knowledge and skills!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生き残っても、その後に滅ぶかもしれないわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if we survive, we might be destroyed afterwards!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知識や技術が無くなった国は、無法地帯になるわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A country without knowledge or skills becomes a lawless land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これだけの戦争の後にそんな事になれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that happens after such a massive war,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国として立ちゆかなくなる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the country won't be able to stand on its own..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待て待て、数が多すぎると言っとるのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, wait, I'm saying there are just too many.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな必須の技術を持ってる奴が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are there really that many people who have such essential skills

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウン万人もいるのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: — tens of thousands of them?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……資格所持者を除外対象にしてるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's because we excluded those who hold certifications,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしてもそうなるわよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so naturally it ends up like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「資格なんぞ必要ない。本当に要る奴と要らん奴を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Certifications aren't necessary. Have someone investigate who's really needed and who's not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人使って調べさせろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Use people to find out."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ……分かったわ……千鶴子に頼んでおく……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I... I understand... I'll ask Chizuruko..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日後。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few days later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうやら……徴兵逃れがそれなりにいたわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems... there were quite a few avoiding conscription."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「資格を飛び込みで取得して……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They suddenly obtained certifications...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時には資格認定する役所を賄賂で抱き込んで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sometimes bribing the offices that certify qualifications,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦地送りを避けていたみたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to avoid being sent to the battlefield."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっきれた……まだそんなのがいたなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm disgusted... I can't believe there are still people like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、そいつらは一人残らず徴兵しろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, conscript every single one of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最前線に送ってやれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Send them all to the front lines."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……でも、貴族の家門の者もいるけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... some are from noble families..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「構わん。文句を言うなら連れてこい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't care. If they complain, bring them to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が直々に頭を叩き割ってくれる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll personally smash their heads."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………いい、マジック？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Is that alright, Magic?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいわ。私の名前で特別徴兵して。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fine. Conscribe them specially under my name.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな連中を養う余裕はないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don't have the luxury to support such people."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あと、そうじゃなくても換えが効く奴は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, even those who are replaceable,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう戦場に放り込め」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: throw them into the battlefield already."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当に必要な知識やら技術やらは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Have those who really possess necessary knowledge and skills,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三日で本を書かせろ。全部残して死ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: write books within three days. Leave absolutely everything behind before you die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でないとみんな死ぬぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If not, everyone will die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいたい、ゼスは特に魔軍が多すぎる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, Zeth especially has too many demon troops."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう……かもしれないわね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That... might be true..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………検討するわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I'll consider it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Rance's reckless orders,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 7万ほどの兵士が前線に送り込まれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: about 70,000 soldiers were sent to the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全然足りん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's nowhere near enough!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「た、足りないって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-It's not enough..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろん兵隊の数だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, the number of soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況は悪化する一方ではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle situation is only getting worse, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは、ッ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, we..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やってるわよ、こっちも……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're doing our best over here too...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう要らん奴はいないのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are there really no unnecessary people left?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この際、後方の輸送隊あたりから引き抜くとか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, why not pull some from the rear transport units?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当に無理よ。これ以上、無理に徴兵したら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's truly impossible. If we force conscription any further,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後先考えずに反発する連中も出るわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there will be people rebelling without thinking about the consequences."

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-Wait a minute!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知識も技術も、残していかないといけないの！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We have to preserve both knowledge and skills!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生き残っても、その後に滅ぶかもしれないわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if we survive, we might be destroyed afterwards!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「知識や技術が無くなった国は、無法地帯になるわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A country without knowledge or skills becomes a lawless land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これだけの戦争の後にそんな事になれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that happens after such a massive war,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 国として立ちゆかなくなる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the country won't be able to stand on its own..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待て待て、数が多すぎると言っとるのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, wait, I'm saying there are just too many.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな必須の技術を持ってる奴が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are there really that many people who have such essential skills

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウン万人もいるのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: — tens of thousands of them?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……資格所持者を除外対象にしてるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's because we excluded those who hold certifications,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしてもそうなるわよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so naturally it ends up like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「資格なんぞ必要ない。本当に要る奴と要らん奴を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Certifications aren't necessary. Have someone investigate who's really needed and who's not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人使って調べさせろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Use people to find out."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ……分かったわ……千鶴子に頼んでおく……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I... I understand... I'll ask Chizuruko..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日後。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A few days later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうやら……徴兵逃れがそれなりにいたわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems... there were quite a few avoiding conscription."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「資格を飛び込みで取得して……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They suddenly obtained certifications...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時には資格認定する役所を賄賂で抱き込んで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sometimes bribing the offices that certify qualifications,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦地送りを避けていたみたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to avoid being sent to the battlefield."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっきれた……まだそんなのがいたなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm disgusted... I can't believe there are still people like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーし、そいつらは一人残らず徴兵しろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, conscript every single one of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最前線に送ってやれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Send them all to the front lines."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……でも、貴族の家門の者もいるけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... some are from noble families..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「構わん。文句を言うなら連れてこい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't care. If they complain, bring them to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が直々に頭を叩き割ってくれる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll personally smash their heads."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………いい、マジック？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Is that alright, Magic?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいわ。私の名前で特別徴兵して。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fine. Conscribe them specially under my name.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな連中を養う余裕はないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don't have the luxury to support such people."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あと、そうじゃなくても換えが効く奴は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, even those who are replaceable,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう戦場に放り込め」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: throw them into the battlefield already."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当に必要な知識やら技術やらは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Have those who really possess necessary knowledge and skills,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三日で本を書かせろ。全部残して死ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: write books within three days. Leave absolutely everything behind before you die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でないとみんな死ぬぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If not, everyone will die.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいたい、ゼスは特に魔軍が多すぎる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides, Zeth especially has too many demon troops."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう……かもしれないわね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That... might be true..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………検討するわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I'll consider it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの無茶苦茶な指示により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Due to Rance's reckless orders,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 7万ほどの兵士が前線に送り込まれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: about 70,000 soldiers were sent to the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全然足りん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's nowhere near enough!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「た、足りないって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-It's not enough..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろん兵隊の数だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, the number of soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況は悪化する一方ではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle situation is only getting worse, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは、ッ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, we..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やってるわよ、こっちも……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're doing our best over here too...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう要らん奴はいないのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are there really no unnecessary people left?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この際、後方の輸送隊あたりから引き抜くとか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At this point, why not pull some from the rear transport units?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当に無理よ。これ以上、無理に徴兵したら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's truly impossible. If we force conscription any further,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後先考えずに反発する連中も出るわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there will be people rebelling without thinking about the consequences."
